TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContourColor extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Drawing.ColorType

Docs.summary: Contour Color. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is a:contourClr.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)]
`contourClr (Contour Color)`
This element defines the color for the contour on a shape. The contour of a shape is a solid filled line which surrounds the outer edges of the shape.
[*Example*: Consider the following example of a contour defined on a shape which includes a contourClr. Lighting characteristics applied to the shape are ignored when it comes to the contour on the shape.
```xml <a:sp3d contourW="101600" prstMaterial="plastic"> <a:bevelT w="254000" h="254000"/> <a:bevelB w="254000" h="254000"/> <a:contourClr> <a:schemeClr val="bg1"/> </a:contourClr> </a:sp3d> ```
In this example, we see a contour defined on a shape with a top and bottom bevel defined. In the image below, the contour is the white ring around the shape.
b493af62-3912-4127-819e-1d27ac96b5bb
*end example*]
|Parent Elements| |---------------------| |sp3d (§21.4.5.6); sp3d (§20.1.5.12)|
|Child Elements|Subclause| |--------------------|---------------| |hslClr (Hue, Saturation, Luminance Color Model)|§20.1.2.3.13| |prstClr (Preset Color)|§20.1.2.3.22| |schemeClr (Scheme Color)|§20.1.2.3.29| |scrgbClr (RGB Color Model - Percentage Variant)|§20.1.2.3.30| |srgbClr (RGB Color Model - Hex Variant)|§20.1.2.3.32| |sysClr (System Color)|§20.1.2.3.33|
[*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_Color) is located in §A.4.1. *end note*]
[!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
